name: GitHub - Dark
description: A much cleaner looking dark theme than most other styles. Uses dark greys that are similar to the ones provided by bootstrap.css.
additional_info:
Not usable with the new Dashboard Beta!

This is a side project which I work on in my spare time, and especially when I feel like it. Of course there are things that need styling, which I will get round to at some point.
#GateHub
